actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to require the Civil Aeronautics Board to disapprove certain pooling and other agreements between air carriers, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Requires the Civil Aeronautics Board to disapprove any agreement between air carriers established for the purpose of apportioning earnings, losses, traffic, service, or equipment during any labor dispute between one of the parties thereto and its employees. Provides that no employee of an air carrier shall receive money from any fund established for the purpose of making payments to such employees during any such labor dispute if any employee of any other carrier has paid into such fund.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to require the Civil Aeronautics Board to disapprove certain pooling and other agreements between air carriers, and for other purposes.
